experiments.desc: Unsupervised, automated mining of biomedical texts: analysis of protein-protein co-mentioning
Import of protein-protein association information from curated knowledge databases
Global analysis of protein-protein interaction data, obtained from the literature and from large-scale datasets (BIND database)
Combined analysis of available microarray data, co-expression analysis
Analysis of presence/absence patterns of genes in genomes: functional partners co-occur
Detection of gene fusion events: functional linkage inferred for the separate components in other genomes
Probabilistic, benchmarked integration of all evidence types: combined confidence score of predicted functional association (range 0.0 to 1.0)
